name: Match the Quote and Movie Quiz | Which Movie | 10 Questions

options: Down and Out in Beverly Hills

questions.text: 'I may not be much Mr. Finch, but I'm still sheriff of Macomb County and Bob Ewell fell on his knife. Goodnight Sir.'
options: In the Heat of the Night

questions.text: 'Now the time has come, I've put two bullets in the gun. One for me, and one for you. Oh darling it will be so beautiful.'
'Of course you can say it backwards, it's dociousaliexpilisticfragicalirupus, but that's going a bit too far.'
questions.explanation:
Mary Poppins.

	Just be glad I didn't make you spell supercalifragiliticexpaliedocious.

questions.text: 'This turns into a Nun's bar, I'm outta here.'
'It was this little girl, five foot nuthin'. She blocked my shot.'
questions.explanation:
Space Jam.

	Said by Charles Barkley.

questions.text: 'You need brains, and I need legs, and the Wizard of Oz doesn't live in South Cincinatti.'
questions.explanation:
The Mighty.

	The movie starred Sharon Stone and Kieran Culkan.

questions.text: 'Tuesday's Plastic Corrosion Awareness Meeting was a big sucesss.'
'All I need are some tasty waves, a cool buzz and I'm fine.'
'Well, I've always believed that if done properly, armed robbery doesn't have to be an unpleasant experience.'
